DATE.description: The date for which the analytics data is recorded.

ADVERTISER_ID.description: The unique identifier of the advertiser involved in the campaign.

AD_ACCOUNT_ID.description: The unique identifier of the advertising account associated with the campaign.

AD_ID.description: The unique identifier of the ad.

AD_GROUP_ENTITY_STATUS.description: The current status of the ad group within the campaign.

AD_GROUP_ID.description: The unique identifier of the ad group within the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_DAILY_SPEND_CAP.description: The daily spending limit set for the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_ENTITY_STATUS.description: The current status of the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_ID.description: The unique identifier of the campaign.

CAMPAIGN_LIFETIME_SPEND_CAP.description: The total spending limit set for the campaign.

CHECKOUT_ROAS.description: The return on ad spend (ROAS) related to checkout actions.

CLICKTHROUGH_1.description: The number of click-throughs for a specific action.

CLICKTHROUGH_1_GROSS.description: The gross number of click-throughs for a specific action, including duplicates.

CPC_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The cost per click (CPC) in micro dollars.

CPM_IN_DOLLAR.description: The cost per mille (CPM) in dollars.

CPM_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The cost per mille (CPM) in micro dollars.

CTR.description: The click-through rate (CTR) for the campaign.

CTR_2.description: Another metric related to click-through rates.

ECPCV_IN_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per converted view in dollars.

ECPCV_P95_IN_DOLLAR.description: The 95th percentile effective cost per converted view in dollars.

ECPC_IN_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per click in dollars.

ECPC_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per click in micro dollars.

ECPE_IN_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per engagement in dollars.

ECPM_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per mille (ECPM) in micro dollars.

ECPV_IN_DOLLAR.description: The effective cost per view in dollars.

ECTR.description: The effective click-through rate (CTR) for the campaign.

EENGAGEMENT_RATE.description: The engagement rate for the campaign.

ENGAGEMENT_1.description: The number of engagements for a specific action.

ENGAGEMENT_RATE.description: The engagement rate for the campaign.

IDEA_PIN_PRODUCT_TAG_VISIT_1.description: The number of visits related to product tags in a pin for a specific action.

IDEA_PIN_PRODUCT_TAG_VISIT_2.description: Another metric related to visits related to product tags in pins.

IMPRESSION_1.description: The number of impressions for a specific action.

IMPRESSION_1_GROSS.description: The gross number of impressions for a specific action, including duplicates.

INAPP_CHECKOUT_COST_PER_ACTION.description: The cost per action related to in-app checkouts.

OUTBOUND_CLICK_1.description: The number of outbound clicks for a specific action.

OUTBOUND_CLICK_2.description: Another metric related to outbound clicks.

PAGE_VISIT_COST_PER_ACTION.description: The cost per action related to page visits.

PAGE_VISIT_ROAS.description: The return on ad spend (ROAS) related to page visits.

PIN_ID.description: The unique identifier of the pin.

PIN_PROMOTION_ID.description: The unique identifier of the promoted pin, if applicable.

REPIN_1.description: The number of repins for a specific action.

REPIN_RATE.description: The repin rate for the campaign.

SPEND_IN_DOLLAR.description: The total spending in dollars for the campaign.

SPEND_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total spending in micro dollars for the campaign.

TOTAL_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total value of checkouts in micro dollars.

TOTAL_CLICK_ADD_TO_CART.description: The total number of clicks leading to adding items to the cart.

TOTAL_CLICK_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of clicks leading to the checkout page.

TOTAL_CLICK_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLL.description: The total value of clicks leading to the checkout page in micro dollars.

TOTAL_CLICK_LEAD.description: The total number of clicks leading to generating leads.

TOTAL_CLICK_SIGNUP.description: The total number of clicks leading to signing up.

TOTAL_CLICK_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total value of clicks leading to signing up in micro dollars.

TOTAL_CUSTOM.description: A custom metric or dimension that is tracked.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT.description: The total number of engagements across actions.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of engagements leading to checkout.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO.description: The total value of engagements leading to checkout in micro dollars.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT_LEAD.description: The total number of engagements leading to generating leads.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT_SIGNUP.description: The total number of engagements leading to signing up.

TOTAL_ENGAGEMENT_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_D.description: The total value of engagements leading to signing up in micro dollars.

TOTAL_IDEA_PIN_PRODUCT_TAG_VISIT.description: The total number of visits related to product tags in pins across actions.

TOTAL_IMPRESSION_FREQUENCY.description: The frequency of impressions per user.

TOTAL_IMPRESSION_USER.description: The total number of unique users reached through impressions.

TOTAL_LEAD.description: The total number of leads generated.

TOTAL_OFFLINE_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of offline checkouts.

TOTAL_PAGE_VISIT.description: The total number of page visits.

TOTAL_REPIN_RATE.description: The overall repin rate across actions.

TOTAL_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total value of signups in micro dollars.

TOTAL_VIDEO_3SEC_VIEWS.description: The total number of 3-second video views.

TOTAL_VIDEO_AVG_WATCHTIME_IN_SECOND.description: The average watch time of video views in seconds.

TOTAL_VIDEO_MRC_VIEWS.description: The total number of viewable video impressions.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P0_COMBINED.description: The percentage of videos that were played to completion.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P100_COMPLETE.description: The percentage of videos that were fully played to completion.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P25_COMBINED.description: The percentage of videos that were 25% viewed.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P50_COMBINED.description: The percentage of videos that were 50% viewed.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P75_COMBINED.description: The percentage of videos that were 75% viewed.

TOTAL_VIDEO_P95_COMBINED.description: The percentage of videos that were 95% viewed.

TOTAL_VIEW_ADD_TO_CART.description: The total number of views leading to adding items to the cart.

TOTAL_VIEW_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of views leading to the checkout page.

TOTAL_VIEW_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLA.description: The total value of views leading to the checkout page in micro dollars.

TOTAL_VIEW_LEAD.description: The total number of views leading to generating leads.

TOTAL_VIEW_SIGNUP.description: The total number of views leading to signing up.

TOTAL_VIEW_SIGNUP_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total value of views leading to signing up in micro dollars.

TOTAL_WEB_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of web checkouts.

TOTAL_WEB_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_DOLLAR.description: The total value of web checkouts in micro dollars.

TOTAL_WEB_CLICK_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of web clicks leading to the checkout page.

TOTAL_WEB_CLICK_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_.description: The total value of web clicks leading to the checkout page in micro dollars.

TOTAL_WEB_ENGAGEMENT_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of web engagements leading to checkout.

TOTAL_WEB_ENGAGEMENT_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_M.description: The total value of web engagements leading to checkout in micro dollars.

TOTAL_WEB_SESSIONS.description: The total number of web sessions.

TOTAL_WEB_VIEW_CHECKOUT.description: The total number of web views leading to the checkout page.

TOTAL_WEB_VIEW_CHECKOUT_VALUE_IN_MICRO_D.description: The total value of web views leading to the checkout page in micro dollars.

VIDEO_3SEC_VIEWS_2.description: Another metric related to 3-second video views.

VIDEO_LENGTH.description: The length of the video in seconds.

VIDEO_MRC_VIEWS_2.description: Another metric related to viewable video impressions.

VIDEO_P0_COMBINED_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos played to completion.

VIDEO_P100_COMPLETE_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos fully played to completion.

VIDEO_P25_COMBINED_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos that were 25% viewed.

VIDEO_P50_COMBINED_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos that were 50% viewed.

VIDEO_P75_COMBINED_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos that were 75% viewed.

VIDEO_P95_COMBINED_2.description: Another metric related to the percentage of videos that were 95% viewed.

WEB_CHECKOUT_COST_PER_ACTION.description: The cost per action related to web checkouts.

WEB_CHECKOUT_ROAS.description: The return on ad spend (ROAS) related to web checkouts.

WEB_SESSIONS_1.description: The number of web sessions for a specific action.

WEB_SESSIONS_2.description: Another metric related to web sessions.
